meanings.sent1: I have a collection of concerti CDs.

meanings.definition: a musical composition for a solo instrument or instruments accompanied by an orchestra
meanings.sent1: She practiced her violin concerto for weeks.
meanings.sent2: The pianist performed a concerto with the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The concerto suddenly turned into a lively dance party.
meanings.sent4: His guitar concerto painted a vivid musical landscape.
meanings.sent5: The concerto filled the room with melodic richness.

meanings.definition: a performance of music by players or singers not involving theatrical staging
meanings.sent1: The concerti at the park delighted the audience.
meanings.sent2: We attended a beautiful outdoor concerti last night.
meanings.sent3: The concerti at the cafe made everyone tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: Her voice soared during the concerti, captivating the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The concerti under the stars was a magical experience.
